sentences.english: Describes the constitution, principle and the latest of Homodialysis Machine.
sentences.chinese: 詳細介紹了血液透析機的組成原理及最新進展。

sentences.english: Conclusion Our result demonstrated that low-sodium solution could significantly increase sodium removal.
sentences.chinese: 結論低鈉透析液能夠明顯增加鈉的清除。

sentences.english: Microdialysis sampling technique and its application in bioanalysis is reviewed with 51 references.
sentences.chinese: 對微透析技術及其在生化分析領域的應用作一綜述。

sentences.english: Only elevating the dialysis sufficiency can not improve the nutritional status obviously.
sentences.chinese: 單純提高透析充分性並不能明顯改善營養狀態。

sentences.english: The release rate of lansoprazole from liposomes was also tested.
sentences.chinese: 採用透析法考察脂質體的釋放規律。

sentences.english: The market competing of hemodialysis machine is fierce.
sentences.chinese: 血液透析機的市場競爭十分激烈。

sentences.english: Objective To prepare plasmid DNA-containing liposomes using detergent removal method and investigate the properties of liposomes.
sentences.chinese: 目的用去污劑透析法制備載基因脂質體並考察其性質。

sentences.english: Objective To decrease the formalin content in the reused dialyzer and reduce the patients' cost.
sentences.chinese: 目的減少複用透析器中的甲醛含量，降低病人費用。

sentences.english: Objective To know about the situation of HCV infection in haemodialysis patients before and after blood transfusion.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解血液透析患者輸血前後HCV感染情況。

sentences.english: Another form of dialysis is called peritoneal dialysis.
sentences.chinese: 另外一個透析方式稱之爲腹膜透析。

sentences.english: Another form of dialysis is called peritoneal dialysis.
sentences.chinese: 另外一個透析方式稱之爲腹膜透析。

sentences.english: You run the dialyzed solution over a size-exclusion chromatographic column.
sentences.chinese: 你將透析了的溶液進行分子排阻層析。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the effect and methods of nursing care of children with toxin of kill-rat medicine treated by hemodialysis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討鼠藥中毒血液透析的療效和護理經驗。

sentences.english: Objective:To investigate the effects of hemodialysis in acute renal failure of the fish' s gall poisoning.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討血液透析搶救魚膽中毒並急性腎衰的療效。

sentences.english: As a new and developing technique, microdialysis has extensive application fields.
sentences.chinese: 微透析技術作爲一項新興技術，應用領域廣泛。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the action of Shenfu injection on abdominal dialysis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討參附註射液在腹膜透析中作用。

pinyin: xin1 zang4 da1 qiao2 shou3 shu4

definition: to be in hospital/to be hospitalized
to receive hospital treatment/to be hospitalized
to transfuse blood/to give aid and support
intravenous infusion/to get put on an IV
